name: PokéShot
description:
"Hi! I'm Viola, a Bug type Gym Leader, and professional photographer. I spend my free time taking pictures of every detail of a Bug-type Pokémon. Colorful wings, long horns and small eyes. For this reason, I want to share my passion, so I want to run a small photo contest! I'm inspired by the Bug-Catching contest in Johto. You should take pictures all Pokémon that you meet. I'll evaluate your photos assigning a score; you could become the best photographer! Use the app to take pictures. I'll be waiting for you... good hunting and you gotta catch 'em all!"

This is an alpha, Let me know for advice or bugs in the comment section.

Pokémon (Day)

  • Butterfree
  • Beautifly
  • Hoppip

Pokémon (Night)

  • Venomoth
  • Dustox
  • Zubat

You can find shiny version!

Instructions (Desktop version)

SPACE - Shot
ALT Left - Flash (to flee Pokémon)
F - Speed up game time (only when the clock hits zero the first time)
